TF057623-YOGYAKARTA AND CENTRAL JAVA
            EARTHQUAKE ROOF STRUCTURE PROJECT (COOPERAT,TF058077-BANK PROJECT APPRAISAL AND
            SUPERVISION FOR JAVA RECONSTRUCTION FUND,TF090001-YOGYAKARTA AND CENTRAL JAVA
            EARTHQUAKE ROOF STRUCTURE PROJECT - INTERNA

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Yogyakarta and
            Central Java Earthquake Roof Structure Project is to respond
            to the most basic needs of the households affected by the
            earthquake through the provision of roof structures that
            transition to permanent housing. The project has four
            components: (i) Preparation of Roof Structure Kits which
            involves prefabrication of the most labor intensive and
            structurally crucial elements of the building, including:
            wall components and bracing, roof frames, and connecting
            beams; (ii) Targeting and Distribution of Kits to
            Beneficiaries by which a selection of
            end-users/beneficiaries will be undertaken according to the
            following procedures: (a) Site identification, (b)
            Beneficiaries list and awareness: in consultation with the
            Kepala Desa (village head) and the community, by which a
            list of eligible households based on data on level of damage
            and number of household members will be established; and (c)
            Ex-post distribution/monitoring; (iii) Assistance to
            Beneficiaries during Construction; and (iv) Quality Control
            and Reporting.
